thread.title: Governors, Attorneys General at Odds Over Obama Policies
thread.title_full: Governors, Attorneys General at Odds Over Obama Policies - WSJ

author: Brent Kendall
title: Governors, Attorneys General at Odds Over Obama Policies
text:
Colorado’s Democratic Gov. John Hickenlooper wants to help implement the Obama administration’s new environmental rules, but he has been relegated to a spectator role as his state’s attorney general joins three lawsuits to invalidate them.
In North Carolina, Republican Gov. Pat McCrory wants his state in court fighting White House environmental and immigration initiatives he views as federal overreach, but is working around the...
